com.likbilen.protorpc.client
Class ResponseWaiter<E>

java.lang.Object
  com.likbilen.protorpc.client.ResponseWaiter<E>
Type Parameters:
E - - the callback type for the Rpc call
public class ResponseWaiter<E>
extends java.lang.Object

This class implements a way to make non blocking Rpc calls blocking. It may be used like this:

 ResponseWaiter waiter = new ResponseWaiter(rpcChannel);
 service.callMethod(controller, request,waiter.getCallback());
 try { 
        E response = waiter.await(); 
        waiter.cleanup();
                
                //handle response 
 
 } catch (InterruptedException e) { 
                //handle exception 
 }
 catch (TimeoutException e) {
                 //handle exception 
 }
 waiter.reset(rpcChannel);//if you want to use it again
